page.title: 03The Adult Training Centre
page.content: Mr Ray Lightfoot is in charge of the Adult Training Centre at Crossmichael. He has been there 10 years. He loves his work and would not do anything else. There are 34 handicapped people there. They make such things as baskets, stools, trays, picture frames, tables, chairs. Mr Lightfoot shows them how to make things and use the machines. The handicapped people start coming to the centre, five days a week, when they leave school, aged 16 or 17. They continue there until they go into an old folks' home.
